inn1.comm: starts off with a length ball outside off. Anamul defends it from the back foot. There was a bit of shape, but nothing alarming
it's between the two slips fielder! Wonderful outswinger, opens up Anamul completely, takes the edge but flies between first slip and second slip! Ashwin at first slip, I think it was his catch..
length ball outside off, this time Anamul lets it go
he comes forward and defends this to the off side
another one in the channel outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
more solid defence by Anamul now, he comes forward and gets on top of the length ball nicely to defend it  down the pitch
he goes on an appeal straightaway, but no interest from anyone else. That was swinging down the leg side
crisply driven through covers! This is excellent stuff from the batsman, he cashes on a fuller delivery. It was swinging away, but he nicely gets behind that
more swing for Shami, but this one is wide outside off and the batsman lets it go with ease
now the inswinger, but this one has been timed very nicely through mid-on! It looked like he was surprised by the inward movement, but managed to push it in the gap
Rohit at second slip dives to his right to stop this thick outside edge! It dropped well short of him, so a nice stop
the bowler is mixing them up - now this one comes in. The batsman defends it to square leg
he comes forward and solidly defends the first ball to cover
too straight from Bhuvi and Anamul flicks it in front of square leg for three runs
this one swings in sharply from outside off and Shamsur makes late adjustment to defends it towards midwicket
he stays in the crease and pushes the length ball towards cover
he waits in the crease and opens the face to run it down past a diving point fielder for a single to third man
fuller and on the middle stump line, that's not going to bother many batsmen. Anamul flicks it to fine leg for a single
brings this one in from outside off at 139 kph, the batsman defends it to the leg side comfortably
fuller and on off stump, 140 kph, the bowler is striving for some swing but it's not there this time, Anamul pushes it to midwicket
he bowls this in the channel outside off and almost draws the batsman into a shot..Almost. Anamul pulls his bat in late
too straight again form Shami, but the inswing means the batsman inside edges his flick on to the pads, picks up a single behind square
this one goes straight on outside off, Shamsur remains patient and leaves it alone
he rises on his toes with the back of length delivery and defends it to gully
he is drawn into a loose poke as this one seams away. His feet stayed rooted to the crease as he pushed away from the body, gets beaten
similar delivery, but this time he gets behind it and punches it to cover
more back foot defence by Anamul, he pushes the short of length delivery back to Bhuvi
he pushes the length up a touch, but Anamul defends it from the crease
he keeps it in the channel outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
this one is on a length outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to backward point

it's over for Shamsur! The short ball brings a wicket, but not before Rayudu and Shami end up making a complete hash of it. It was a surprise short ball and Shamsur tried to whip it to the leg side, but he got a thick leading edge that ballooned to the off side, towards cover, not very far from the pitch. Shami charged, and Rayudu charged towards the ball too, without anyone calling for it. Shami takes it in the end, but that was just about to go down..Shami's hand actually hit Rayudu's face there
he drives the first delivery straight down the ground and unfortunately for him, hits the stumps at the other end
short of length and it seams away from the batsman, the batsman leaves it alone
outside off again, the batsman stays on the back foot and opens the face to run it down to third man
back of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it to the leg side
ends the over with another sharp delivery outside off, the batsman is surprised by the bounce but manages to keep it down towards gully
seeing Shami got a wicket with the short one, Bhuvi attempts one of his own, but this sails over the top of the batsman
back of length outside off, there is not much pace on it and Mominul punches it comfortably to the point fielder
he waits on the back foot and defends the back of length delivery towards cover
oh this is beautifully timed through point! It was a length delivery outside off and Mominul comes forward first, then uses his wrists to slice it behind point. There was not much room on that
the batsman dabs it towards mid-on for a quick single
this one doesn't get up too much from back of length, but Anamul pushes it comfortably to cover off the back foot
another sharp short ball form Shami! It registers 139 kph on the speed gun, but looks like it skidded quicker, the batsman sways away from the line
short of length on the body, Mominul stays on the back foot and defends it to cover
another short ball by Shami - clearly he is impressed with this length after taking that wicket - but this is over the shoulder now
oh he pushes the length up and Mominul is slow to cover the line, plays a loose drive and that misses the inside edge ..and the off stump
he manages to get the outside edge this time, but this goes through the vacant first-slip region.. There is a third slip in place and a gully.. but no first slip or second..
fuller delivery again, this time Mominul gets behind it and pushes it to mid-off
this short-ball bug is infectious! Another one from Bhuvi and Anamul goes for a hook, gets a thick top edge and gets four.. It wasn't very far from fine leg, but beats him comfortably
another short ball, another hook shot, another top edge.. This one is to the left of fine-leg and Shami almost gets there.. It was actually very close, a forward dive and he would have got to it
back of length delivery on off, Anamul punches it to cover off the back foot
length ball on off stump and Anamul whips it from there to fine leg, a bit risky, but he does well this time
length ball outside off, Mominul guides it to third man with a wristy flick
length delivery on off, the batsman defends it towards point
starts off the new over with a fuller delivery that is pushed to the off side
too straight this time and Mominul tucks it behind square on the leg side for a couple of runs
hesitation! Both batsmen go for a dash, then stop, then turn back as the fielder charges from midwicket, fires in  a throw, misses and the batsman is safe
short ball again, this time the batsman ducks under it in time
length delivery on the off stump line, the batsman comes forward to push it back to the bowler
fuller delivery, the batsman looks to work it away on the on side but gets an inside edge on to his pads
he stays in the crease and defends the length ball back down the pitch
length ball outside off, the batsman defends it to point
another shortish delivery, but this is well outside off and is comfortably left alone
a change of tactic from Anamul as he charges down the pitch and lifts the length ball over midwicket. But there is a fielder at deep square leg now, who keeps them to two
short of length on the middle stump line, the batsman whips it to fine leg
length delivery outside off, Mominul loves playing this wristy guide behind point and he does it again, picking up an easy single to third man
and he gets a nice welcome from Mominul, who comes forward and drives the full delivery neatly through the gap at cover for a boundary
make it two in a row! Aaron bowls another half-volley and Mominul punishes it with another drive through covers
he pulls the length back a touch and gets the batsman to play a loose push, beats him with the inward angle
now he is hitting a short length and on the off stump, the batsman defends it to the leg side
and shorter.. Mominul arches his back to get away of the line
he has been playing this short so well, the wristy flick to third man, and he does it again as he gets room outside off

he has got wicket first ball! This is brilliantly stumped by DK! Mominul tried to work this flighted delivery to the leg side, got an inside edge to his pads and then the ball rolled back towards the stumps.. Mominul had no idea where the ball was, by the time he turned back, DK already had broken the stumps..He was playing well, Mominul.
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman defends it to midwicket
more flight from Ashwin, this one is outside off and is defended to cover
another outside edge, this one flies wide of the lone slip. The batsman was playing for the turn and tried to whip it to the leg side, but gets a thick leading edge
tossed up and fuller too, defended to midwicket
now he gets a single with a little nudges to square leg
starts off with a short of length ball, but the line is not right.. This is way down the leg side
fuller length outside off now, 143 kph, Mushy comes forward and covers the stumps before leaving it alone
fuller delivery on off, 145kph, the batsman comes forward to punch it back to the bowler
fuller delivery, slightly wide outside off and Mushy deals with it nicely, crisply punching it on the up, but hits it straight to the point fielder
short of length delivery outside off, 147 kph, the batsman gets up on his toes and defends
he comes forward and drives the length delivery to deep cover for a single
back of length outside off, the batsman defends it to the off side
fuller delivery on off, the batsman comfortably drives it to wide long on
tossed up and slower on off, the batsman comes forward and defends
this beats everyone! It's misdirected down the leg side, and DK is slow to cover the line ..
some sharp turn for the bowler, it's worked away to square leg
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman defends it towards square leg
flatter delivery and it stays low too, the batsman defends it to midwicket
on the off stump line and turning in, the batsman defends it to midwicket
a good shot this by Mushy, he comes forward and punches the length ball on the up.. Good work by Kohli at mid-off who dives to prevent a certain boundary
short ball outside off, gives Mushy enough time to go on the back foot, roll his wrists and play it nicely to deep midwicket
another short delivery, too short this time.. Mushy slaps it to wide mid-on for a single

this is out of nowhere! This has been smashed over long on with ridiculous ease. Aaron has been bowling quick, this was 144 kph, and the batsman charges down the pitch and whacks it over long on, surprises everyone
he bowls length outside off and this time the batsman defends it off the back foot
full and on the pads, it's whipped down to fine leg for a single
fuller delivery on off, the batsman defends it to square leg
flatter this time, it's punched down to long on easily
tossed up wide outside off, this one doesn't turn and the batsman waits and cuts it late for a single
tossed up outside off, it's defended back to the bowler
this one pitches on off and turns down the leg side, it's helped on its way to fine leg
he waits on the back foot and defends the length delivery to gully
fuller and on the pads, the batsman shuffles across the stumps to whip it to fine leg for a single
he tries to play a late cut, but the length is not short enough and he is beaten
similar length from Aaron, but this takes off after hitting the pitch and flies past the outside edge
aims for a yorker, but it's a half-volley on the pads and Mushy flicks it in the air towards deep square leg
he tries to defend this length delivery towards point, but gets an under edge past the wicketkeeper, comes back for a couple by the time third-man does the clean up
good length delivery in the channel and good leave by the batsman
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman drives it to mid off
plays a premeditated paddle and picks it up from outside off, gets a single to fine leg
he steps out of the crease and whips the flighted delivery to deep midwicket
he goes on the back foot and punches this through cover, there is no one in the deep and they take three
tossed up on off, the batsman defends it to the leg side
he looks to step out, but the bowler pushes it down the leg side. The batsman misses the ball, but gets back in time
keeps it tight outside off, Mushy defends it to the off side
he rises up on his toes and punches this nicely to deep point

Anamul's frequent charges down the pitch are surprising everyone! This is a flat-batted swat and this has sailed over cow corner again. It was short of length, 147 kph apparently, and he took it from around his shoulder height.. Excellent shot
he stays in the crease and guides it behind point
there is no violence on this shot! High elbow, straight bat, punched down the ground between the bowler and mid-off, another excellent shot
goes for a yorker, but this is a low full toss and Anamul slices it through to deep cover for a single
tossed up delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to square leg
he comes down the pitch and pushes it to midwicket, but no run
some hesitation as the batsman briefly thinks about a single behind square leg, but decides against it
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman drives it to midwicket
takes a step forward and defends the length delivery down the pitch
more solid defence by the batsman, pushed to midwicket
flatter delivery outside off and Mushy laps it to fine leg for an easy single
flatter and shorter outside off, no problems for Anamul as he punches this to deep cover
slower and tossed up on off, Mushy comes forward and defends
he pushes this one to the cover
another paddle shot, but there is no risk as he takes it from outside off to fine leg
comes forward and punches the length delivery straight to cover
tossed up but this is comfortably down the leg side
corrects his line and Mushy cuts him behind point for a single
he comes forward to defend this down the pitch
steps out of the crease and defends the tossed up delivery
flatter this time, the batsman punches it down to long on for a single
fuller and flighted, Mushy drives it to wide long on for another easy single
what a neat pick! Anamul brings up his half-century with a clean hit to the sight screen. He stepped out, got to the pitch of the ball and just lifted it straight down the ground.
there was a hesitation and Anamul had charged down the pitch, but the point fielder couldn't collect the ball cleanly
he pushes the quicker delivery towards cover
goes down on his knees early and paddles it to square leg, was slightly beaten by the pace of that delivery
he comes forward and pushes the quicker delivery to deep point for a single
shorter and flatter outside off, Mushy goes on the back foot and punches it to deep cover
another shortish delivery and the batsman punches it through cover, but a Kohli dive prevents the single
full and flighted on the middle stump line, the batsman whips it straight to square leg
some turn, but this one spins down the leg side
oh this is marginally short and Mushy cracks it off the back foot through cover, beats the deep point fielder
he comes forward and defends this down the pitch
steps out of the crease but defends as he is not to the pitch of the ball
the length is slightly shorter and the batsman paddles it fine on the leg side for another easy run
fuller delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
this time he sweeps it to deep backward square leg for an easy single
quicker and straight, the batsman comes forward and defends
stays in the crease and punches the length delivery to the left of the bowler
some turn as Jadeja floats it outside off, the batsman though leaves it alone
he is quickly running through his overs, this one is defended back to the bowler
flatter and down the leg side, whipped to deep square leg
bowls a filthy full toss, Mushy misses out as he hits straight to midwicket
full and on off, the batsman flicks it to long on for a single
flatter and shorter outside off, the batsman punches it to deep cover
on the pads, it's flicked easily to deep midwicket
floated on off stump, the batsman pushes it to cover
flatter and quicker outside off, Anamul cuts it straight to backward point
pushed through outside off, the batsman punches it to cover now
slower and fuller, Anamul eases it to wide long off for a single
flatter and on the pads, Mushy has no problems in nudging it through square leg for a single
pushed through on the stumps, no room to work it around and the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
he punishes this full and wide delivery through extra cover with a scything drive
slower and on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to midwicket
fuller again, this time the batsman punches it down the ground, but is not able to beat the bowler
quicker and flatter on off stump, the batsman nudges it to square leg, but is not able to pick up a single
full on the off side, Mushy looks for that extra cover region again, but hits it straight to mid off
here comes the mow! He cleared his front leg out and slogged that flat and quick through cow corner. Another good over for Bangladesh.
tossed up on off stump, the batsman defends it to the off side
tries to send this out of the ground, but doesn't get hold of it, pushes it to long on
flatter and quicker on off, the batsman punches it to cover
a touch towards the pads and Mushy picks up a single to midwicket
stays in the crease and punches it to long on, but Shami just runs over the ball and gives away an extra.. Poor effort by Shami as he was too casual there
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends it down the pitch
bowls it short on the stumps, the batsman flat bats it to deep midwicket
quicker delivery, the batsman looks to whip it to midwicket, but gets a leading edge to mid off
on the pads and this is nudged to deep square leg for a single
fuller delivery, this is driven down the ground to long on
flatter and quicker outside off, the batsman goes for a late cut, but is beaten
tossed up delivery on the stumps, easily whipped to deep square leg
fuller and on the stumps, the batsman pushes it to mid on for another easy single
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to long off for a single
he comes forward and drives it comfortably to wide long off for another single
pushes the flatter delivery to cover
another easy single to long off, Bangladesh look completely untroubled
fuller on the pads, he clips it to backward square leg for a single
they pick up a couple and bring the 100 of the stand, Mushy running hard after pushing the straight delivery down the ground
fuller delivery on off, this is driven neatly to deep cover
length delivery on off, Anamul calmly punches it back to the bowler
slightly slower than what the batsman anticipated.. He tried to cut it late and gets beaten
this one slips out of his hand, it's a high full toss that the batsman can only push as far as long on
now Mushy gets to his half-century with a calm punch down to long off. Wonderful partnership this. This is the eighth hundred partnership for Bangladesh against India in ODIs, third for the 3rd wkt
tossed up delivery, it's pushed down the ground to long off
this one is too short, Anamul gets all the time to punch it firmly to deep extra cover
pushes forward and gets a leading edge towards cover
stays in the crease and pushes the flatter delivery to short cover
this time, he comes forward and eases it to long off
he gets down on his knee and paddles this fine for a comfortable single
starts off with a short ball from round the wicket, but the batsman plays a controlled hook fine on the leg side
he goes back over the wicket and bowls a length delivery on off, the batsman defends it to midwicket
slightly short of length, Mushy gets up on his toes and punches this through to deep cover
this stays low and the batsman gets an underedge to the keeper, he was pushing at the length ball from the crease
bowls a slower delivery on off, Anamul drives it to mid-off, but Kohli threw it towards non-striker's end belatedly, but no one was backing up..Allows an extra
fuller on the stumps, that's punched to midwicket
tossed up on off, Mushy drives it down the ground to long on
flatter and quicker on off, the batsman punches it to off, but can't beat the cover fielder
some drift for Jadeja, it's punched to deep midwicket off the front foot
he looks for a quick single with a dab to the leg side, but Jadeja is on to the ball in a flash
he was going for it no matter what the length! this was outside off and shorter in length, but Mushy whacks this over cow corner nicely..
quicker delivery on off, now Mushy defends it back to the bowler
he skips down the pitch, but makes the length ball a yorker, it's dug out to mid-off
oh lovely shot! He charges down the pitch, makes some room along the way too, gets a length delivery, and just chips it over mid-off.. Nothing rash about that, just timing
and Aaron dishes out a high full toss that is hammered over point for another boundary. It's a no-ball for height too
another extra as he loses direction and bowls this down the leg side
full toss galore, this one is on the pads and the batsman flicks it straight to deep midwicket
this one is on the target - full and aimed at off. Mushy pushes it back to the bowler
length delivery on off stump, Mushy dabs it to cover with softs hands and calls for a quick single

Timber!! Finally Aaron gets one on the line. That extra delivery doing the job. It was full and outside off, the batsman comes forward and chops it on to his leg stump. Anamul is disappointed with himself, he almost breaks his bat in half..
quicker delivery on off stump, the batsman punches it to cover
stays on the back foot and punches it to cover again
looks to heave it to the leg side from wide outside off, gets beaten as the ball slides under the bat
comes down the pitch and pushes it back to the bowler
comes down the pitch and drives it to long off
fuller and wider outside off, Mushy can only push it to long off
short delivery to the new batsman, Naeem ducks under it in time
this is hammered over point! It was full and wide, but Mushy somehow gets under it and slices it over point, just lands before the boundary

Aaron continues to leak runs! But this is some timing from Mushy! There was nothing wrong with that delivery, it was on a length outside off, but Mushy opens the face to used the pace of the ball. Once it beat the point fielder, there was no stopping that
he pushes this with soft hands towards mid-on and comes back for a second
slower delivery, but this is down the leg side. Another extra. He gave away two in his last over

What a shot!! Absolutely stunning! This is fuller on the pads, but this is picked up with such ease, it's like he is playing in his backyard, uses his bottom hand to send it miles over the deep square leg boundary. Very Sanath Jayasuriya like

oh that's got to hurt! Mushy is down on the ground! Aaron bowls a beamer that strikes Mushy on the chest and he goes down immediately. The bowler runs to him first to check on him. That was quick and the batsman had no time to get out of the way. It hit the batsman just under his armpit as he tried to evade it
length delivery, it's pushed to mid-on for a single
floated wide outside off, Mushy drives it to deep cover for a single
punches the fuller delivery firmly to long off for a single
full and outside off, the batsman digs it out to cover
he looks to push it to the off side but gets an under edge to the keeper
he pushes it to the leg side for a quick single
comes down the pitch and punches the full delivery to long off
flighted on the pads, turns down the leg side, but the umpire reckons it flicked something on its way
it is tucked to backward square leg, but the fielder prevents a single
he stays on the back foot and punches it to deep cover for a single
big turn for Ashwin from outside off, but this has gone too far down leg
another one down the leg side, another wide
now he tosses it up on off, but Mushy sweeps it comfortably down to fine leg
this is floated outside off and Naeem laps it from there to deep backward square leg
on the off stump, Mushy calmly defends it down the pitch
length delivery on off stump, the batsman can only get it as far as midwicket
clears his front leg out and looks it to mow over wide mid-on, but gets an inside edge on to his pads
fuller delivery, almost a yorker on the middle, the batsman can only dig it out to midwicket
he shuffles across and punches the yorker to long on for a single
oh that's a good slower ball! He rolled his fingers, bowled it on a length and on the stumps, the batsman looks to nudge it to the leg side, but gets rapped in the pads
Naeem uses the Anamul method to get moving - he charges down the pitch, plays a forehand winner down the line, gets a boundary at deep midwicket. No chance for any fielder
oh that was a big top edge but luckily for Mushy, that lands safely at deep backward square leg! He was looking to slog sweep this from outside off
waits on the crease and pushes the flatter delivery to the leg side
he bowls his carrom ball now, but Naeem tucks it to square leg for a single
quicker and flatter outside off, the batsman looks to play the late cut, but the ball was too full for that
now he plays the late cut with ease as the length is much shorter, Jadeja has to retrieve the ball, but Mushy gets three for that
this could have been a tricky run to square leg, but the throw from Shami is not accurate. Mushy gets in easily
he shuffles across the crease and whips the full delivery to wide long on
bowls a low full toss in search of a yorker, the batsman is not able to beat the mid-off fielder
slower delivery on the stumps, the batsman dabs it to cover for a quick single
gets the yorker right, the batsman manages to dig it out to deep midwicket
another searing yorker from Shami! Naeem jams his bat down to block it

he drives it straight to extra cover! Naeem was looking to clear the infield, but he didn't get any elevation despite getting it off the middle of the bat, Ashwin didn't have to budge. It was flat and straight to him
this is down the leg side and it's easily tickled down the leg side for a couple
carrom ball again! But it doesn't beat anyone anymore, easily pushed to point for a single
tossed up on off, the batsman nudges it straight to square leg
flatter and turning in, the batsman defends it to the leg side again
that's a drop by the keeper! It was wide and Nasir went for a fierce cut, got a thick edge, but DK was unable to hold on
flatter and coming in after pitching, Mushy dabs it behind point and calls for a quick single

oh he gets to his second ODI century, first from a Bangladesh batsman against India since Alok Kapali. He pushed this good yorker to mid-off, but gets to his hundred as there was no one backing up the throw from Kohli.. It went all the way to fine leg boundary where Bhuvi was slow to react. Mushy is ecstatic. What a knock by the captain!
stays on the crease and pushes this length delivery to cover
looks to dab this one through off, but hits it straight to point
another wicket for Shami! It was a slower delivery and Nasir throws the bat it, gets a thick outside edge that DK holds on to this time
starts off with a length delivery on off stump, the batsman can only defend it to off
he dabs it to cover for a single and to keep the strike
starts off with an accurate length delivery on off, the batsman can only push it to cover
Flat, flat six by Zia! Another length ball from Bhuvi, but Zia was ready for it this time.. Clears his front leg and swats it like a fly to deep midwicket
he pushes this calmly to long off to turn the strike over
full and wide yorker, it's dug out to point by Mushfiqur. No protection behind that fielder
another accurate yorker, the batsman digs it out to cover for a single
third yorker in a row. Not much the batsman can do about it, it's dug out back down the pitch
a loud appeal for lbw!, but the batsman has got some bat on it! He was looking to ramp it fine on the leg side by moving way across the off side, but got a leading edge to short third man
he slightly errs with his length and Zia takes full toll, slashes it over the bowler's head for a boundary. It was off the toe of the bat, but it was surprising how much power he got behind that
another low full toss and again it's hammered over the umpire's head, but this time Jadeja, from long on, cuts it off
Go Mushy Go! The captain loves to play the slog sweep! He gets under this full delivery some how by going deep in the crease and whacks it to the cow corner area
now charges down the pitch, takes the bowl on the full and drives it to wide long off for a couple
and he threads the gap again, drives it to wide long off for another couple
he steps down the pitch early and gets a yorker on his toes, but he does well to punch it down the ground to long on
another good yorker, the batsman can only dig it out to long on
oh it's a good yorker but Zia manufactures a wonderful shot! He moved way down the leg side and squeezes it through the gap at point!! He took it from outside leg stump
another good yorker, the batsman jams his bat down and plays it to square leg

Aaron takes a fine catch at cover! Zia went for the repeat of the shot he played two balls ago, but this time he plays it in the air and a touch straighter. Aaron dives to his right and hangs on to a blinder. But he is in pain as he lands awkwardly - he was holding his left leg in pain. Wondeful cameo by Zia though. Just what Bangladesh needed
and another yorker! The batsman digs it out to cover
another one at the base of the middle stump, Gazi pushes it to long off
how did he find that gap! Wonderful batting. Nothing wrong with the delivery - it was a full one on the middle stump. But Mushy takes his front leg out and whacks it along the ground to cow corner

Mushy's fine innings comes to an end! He slaps a high full toss straight to deep midwicket, but the umpire wants to check it for a) front-fott, and b) the height. First one is fine, and second one should be fine too as Mushy had charged way down the pitch. It looks like it was waist high when he made contact, but the ball had another two meters to go to the stumps. That's it, the umpires think it was fine. A wonderful innings from Mushy comes to an end. The Indian fielders pat him on the back..
he keeps bowling the yorkers, Mashrafe squeezes it out to extra cover
another one aimed at the base of stumps, only a single again to long on
he looks to ramp it up over the keeper's head, gets hit on the pads, and the ball lobs to the keeper. DK takes an aim at the stumps, but no one is backing up, so they take an extra

inn2.comm: that stayed low! We have seen Rohit get bowled by those a few times, but he is very lucky to get his bat down in time. That was heading for the stumps
this time he comes forward and defends the angled delivery towards mid-on
pushes forward and punches the length ball towards cover
he keeps it accurate around off stump and the batsman defends it to mid on
he takes a step down the pitch and flicks the length delivery to deep midwicket
he waits on the crease and pushes the length ball to the off side
and he makes a solid start too, bowling a length delivery on off that the batsman can only defend
this one was quick and swinging away, Rohit looked like he was about to leave it, but throws his bat at that late, survives as the ball evades the outside edge
another one beats the bat! This one is fuller and wider, 142 kph, and Rohit is slow to push forward, but the ball swings away from him
this one is closer to the off stump and this time, the batsman gets behind the line to drive it to mid off
oh he timed this so well, but straight to point. It was a back of length delivery and he just rose with the bounce
fuller and on the stumps, Rohit plants his front foot out, then defends it towards mid on
he doesn't judge the line well here! That was coming straight at the stumps and Dhawan was looking to play a chop on the off, he adjusts late to push it back to the bowler
good length on off stump, the batsman moves forward to punch it to short cover
he gets beaten this time as he tries to cut a length ball that is too close to the off stump. It stayed a touch low too
another tight delivery, but Dhawan punches it straight to cover, from the middle of his bat
another one stays low after pitching on short of length! The batsman carefully pushes it to the off side
slower delivery on the pads, Dhawan can only push it to short midwicket.
he comes forward and drives the length ball to cover point
that has been caressed to the boundary! You can always expect Rohit to look pretty when he plays these. This was full and wide, and he slices it past point
again, he comes forward and opens the face right at the last moment to guide it towards gully for a quick single
he comes forward and punches the length delivery towards cover
slower and fuller outside off, Dhawan was looking to blast it through the off side, but the ball arrives much laters, he ends up pushing it to cover
a loud appeal for lbw! but this was pitched comfortably outside leg. Dhawan was stuck in the crease and was hit much below the knee-roll.
no slip anymore, but Mashrafe gets this to shape away nicely. Rohit leaves it alone
he waits for the ball on the back foot and dabs it towards mid-on with the turn of his wrists
that's a Dhawan special! He takes a tiny step down the pitch, takes the ball on the full, then, it's the timing.. That screeches along the grass to the cover boundary
no room on this one as the bowler targets the leg and middle stump. Dhawan defends it off the back foot
oh he wanted to try the earlier shot again. Dhawan steps out, but Mashrafe smartly slows it down. The batsman can only punch it straight to point
once again, he moves down the pitch and punches the length delivery to cover point
he comes behind the line of the ball solidly and punches it back to the bowler
he delivers this from wide of the crease and Rohit uses the angle to clip it to deep square leg
they are doing well by not giving Dhawan any room. Rubel does the same again and Dhawan, for some reason, is reluctant to play on the on side
slower delivery outside off, messes up Dhawan's plan of punching it through covers. He ends up chopping it to point
another slower delivery! Dhawan had moved down the pitch, but had to wait for the ball to arrive, punched to cover
another good delivery, Dhawan punches it to wide mid-off for a quick single, but the Bangladesh bowlers are not giving him any room
ok so now he pulls out the leg-side shot! It's not short at all, but because it's slower, he gets enough time to jab it behind square for a boundary
charges down the pitch and Mashrafe slows it down, the batsman can only punch it to short cover
another tight delivery on the stumps, slightly slower too, Dhawan pushes it to cover
this one is almost a spinner's delivery! Pitches outside leg stump, then cuts away sharply to beat the outside edge
he slaps a length ball to the off side, but is not able to beat the crowded cover cordon
now he manages to get it through the infield, but Mushy has smartly plugged the gap in the deep as well. There is a deep cover for this shot
he attempts a slower bouncer, but this is down the leg side. It did surprise Dhawan though
short delivery on the body, Dhawan was not in control of that, but managed to tickle it to the fine leg boundary
he corrects the line to the middle stump area, and doesn't give the batsman any pace. Dhawan can only push it to cover
he steps out, tries to create room by moving towards the leg side, but the bowler follows him. Dhawan chops it towards gully
second time the Bangladesh bowlers have erred on the leg stump line. Just like the last over, Dhawan flicks it to the right of the short fine leg fielder.
he comes forward and defends the length delivery solidly. But this over is likely to get bigger as Rubel has overstepped by a mile
What a yorker! That takes the leg stump out! Unfortunately, that is not going to fetch you anything as it was a free hit. What a waste
slower delivery on off stump, Dhawan guides it to third man for a single
they are keeping it very tight with these slower balls! Dhawan pushes this straight to mid on
another tight delivery, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
no room, absolutely no room! Dhawan is being kept in a straightjacket and he can only push for a single to midwicket
he presses forward and has a lot of time to open the face of the bat to run it down to third man
on the middle stump line again, still no pace is being given to Dhawan. The batsman pushes it to wide mid-on for a single
he pushes forward and takes another single to third man
he starts off with a low full toss that is calmly punched to long off for a single
he goes over the wicket and immediately there is an appeal as Dhawan misses his sweep! It is probably slipping down the leg, but it looked mighty close
oh what timing is that! He came out of the crease, the bowler bowled short, the batsman then just went through with the punch through cover. it looked like a push, but that raced across the turf
he comes out again, but the bowler shortens his length and Dhawan has to curb his aggression
another tight delivery, Dhawan defends it towards point
another appeal for lbw! This time Dhawan misses the reverse sweep and gets hit in front of the stumps. Billy Bowden again reckons that would have turned down the leg side.. Close again
oi!! That takes off from a length, surprises Rohit who was pressing forward in defence! Luckily for Rohit, it takes a leading edge and flies through the vacant gully region
fuller delivery on the pads and Dhawan whips it with his steely wrists behind square on the leg side, calls for a second and makes it comfortably
charges out and slashes at the length ball, but it's hit straight to the point fielder
slower delivery, Dhawan has to wait for a long time before whipping it to deep square leg

what. A. Shot! Rohit is probably the biggest hitter in the India team and he shows why. Just steps down and looks to hit it over the bowler's head, but it keeps going, and going, and all the way to the sight screen
pushes it softly to mid-on for a quick single
tossed up on off stump line, Rohit comes forward and eases it to long off. That brings up yet another fifty for these two

he is gone! It's over! There were two appeals in the last over, but this time Billy Bowden goes with the bowler. He misses his sweep and he is struck right in front. Big big breakthrough for Bangladesh. That was hit in front of the off stump, would have hit the middle
that's the arm ball and Kohli wasn't expecting that! Strikes him on the back leg, but that was slipping down.
stays on the back foot and defends this solidly back down the pitch
those whippy drives are on show already! this one is tossed up and Kohli pushes it to long off
he pushes forward and defends the tossed up delivery to the off side
bowls with his customary high leap, but that didn't bounce too much. Kohli however is comfortably tucking it behind square for a single
the length delivery is pushed towards point off the front foot
on the pads and Rohit flicks it to deep square leg without any fuss
rolls his fingers across as he delivers this length ball, Kohli is in no hurry, guides it to third man for a single

huge wicket for Zia in his first over! He has gone through the defence! This one was only a touch short in length, but jagged back from a length and sneaks in, hit the thigh pad and drops on to the stumps. Rohit falls after another start.
another good tight first ball for the new batsman. Rahane comes forward and defends
he comes forward to the flighted delivery and pushes it to cover
tries to smash this through cover, but is a touch early on the shot, ends up playing it back to the bowler
opens his stance to the flighted delivery and drives it to long off
comes right behind the ball and defends it to midwicket
now the slider, the batsman plays outside the line of that and is beaten. Saved by the angle on that one
this one grips and spins away, takes the outside edge but drops short of the first slip fielder
bowls length on the pads, but Kohli is unable to beat the midwicket fielder with his flick
he comes behind the line of the ball solidly and defends it to off
short and wide, but it doesn't bounce as much as the batsman would have liked, he is beaten playing the cut shot
a slower ball now, it stays low as well. Kohli digs it out towards off side
poor delivery, this one is down the leg side and Kohli helps it on its way to the deep backward square leg boundary
length delivery on off, the batsman presses forward and punches it on the up to deep cover
short and wide, that is going to be easy pickings for Kohli as he cuts it behind point for a couple
oh he almost chops it on! He goes on the back foot to cut it, but the ball stays low, takes the under edge and bounces over the stumps
a poor follow up delivery by Razzak. He fires it on Kohli's pads and gets flicked to the fine leg boundary
tossed up on the middle stump line, the batsman moves forward and defends
flatter and quicker, Kohli goes deep in the crease and clips it to deep square leg
nicely timed for nothing! Rahane goes on the back foot and punches it straight to cover
starts off with a short of length delivery outside off, Kohli steers it down to third man
another back of length delivery, the batsman stays in the crease and pushes it to deep cover for a single
short, wide, crashed through point! That was a hit-me delivery, came up at the right height too. The slower deliveries have been working fine, but this was delivered at a normal pace
now he cuts down on pace, the batsman can only push it to cover
takes the pace off again with this short of length delivery, Kohli wanted a single to point, but Rahane sends him back
slower delivery on off, he waits on the back foot and dabs it towards gully for a single
pushed through on the leg stump line, Kohli goes back and nudges it to deep square leg for a single
tossed up delivery on the pads, the batsman comes forward and flicks it to short fine leg
tossed up and full, the batsman comes forward and pushes it cover
flatter and quicker now, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
some spin for Razzak, but Rahane plays it well too
flatter and pushed through on off, the batsman defends it down the pitch
fuller delivery outside off, Kohli slashes at it and hits it in the air past point. That would have interested the fielder for a bit, but that was walloped with some power

short and wide outside off, Kohli attempts to pull it to mid-on from there - he got out in NZ in a similar delivery - but because the ball comes slow off the pitch, he ends up flat-batting it past the bowler without any timing
he stays on the back foot and defends the length delivery down the pitch

that has been carved over third-man for a six! For a moment, that would have kept the fielder interested too. But Rahane played that expertly, arching back and just ramping the short ball towards third man
he stays in the crease and punches it to cover
he dabs the slower delivery towards cover point for a quick single to keep the strike
tossed up delivery on the middle, the batsman comes forward to defend
nicely bowled, it was the slider and Rahane pushed outside the line. The inside edge to square leg gives him the single
flighted on off stump, Kohli comes forward and gets on top of it to defend it to off
loopy and fuller, the batsman pushes it to cover
another good delivery, the batsman again defends it to cover
pushed through on the pads, Kohli whips it to deep square leg
that has been sent into the orbit! He was waiting for a poor delivery - he seldom lets them go unpunished. Gazi bowls a long hop and is pulled well over deep midwicket
better delivery now, and Kohli defends it to the leg side

another poor delivery and almost gave him the big wicket! It was short and down the leg side, but didn't bounce much at all, Kohli went for the pull, but was not in control - he played it in the air towards square leg. The ball just dropped away from the diving square leg fielder
spins in from off stump line, the batsman punches it to square leg
slides down the leg side, but that was not far from the bat, wide called
on the middle stump line, the batsman pushes it to midwicket
another one down the leg side, called a wide
finishes off with a tight delivery on the stumps, Kohli flicks it to square leg
slightly short from Razzak and Rahane goes on the back foot to punch it to long off
he waits on the back foot for this flighted delivery and pushes it back to the bowler
that is played very late. Kohli goes back and dabs the slow delivery from in front of the middle stump towards point
slightly straying on to the pads, the batsman nudges it to deep square leg
that's a Kohli special! It was tossed up wide outside off, and Kohli stretches forward and smashes it with a wristy flick through cover. No one moves
another boundary and it ends up in the same area at extra cover! But this one is a back foot punch. What timing. There is a fielder in the deep, but he had no chance to stop that
flatter on the stumps, the batsman goes back and whips it to deep midwicket for a single
slower and tossed up full. Kohli comes forward and defends it to midwicket
flatter and on the leg stump line, it grazes the pads on its way to short fine leg, but Rahane calls for a quick single
he allows the ball to turn in, then clips it to backward square leg
a dab to midwicket gives Rahane another single
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and eases it to long on
fuller outside off, this was there to be hit and Kohli drives it nicely, but can't beat the man at cover
short of length on off stump, Kohli steers it to third man for an easy single
back of length on off, there is no room on this, Rahane defends
he comes forward and pushes the length ball down the ground for a single
slower delivery on off stump, but Kohli comfortably pushes it to long on for a single
that stayed a touch low, but Rahane doesn't seem to be bothered as he tucks it to deep midwicket
flatter delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it in the air towards midwicket
on this stayed very low, but Rahane, who was on the back foot, manages to get some bat on it and plays it towards short fine leg
he brings up yet another half-century with a calm push to point. His 31st half century...
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends
another one that stays very low, the batsman goes back and chips it to long on off the toe end
quicker delivery on off, the batsman defends it to midwicket
length delivery on the stumps, Rahane comes forward as it is staying low, he drives it to deep midwicket
length delivery on off, no problems for Kohli as he punches it to long on
inside edge saves Rahane there! He was playing across the line to this slower delivery and was beaten by the movement, but managed to get an inside edge
comes forward to this length ball and punches it to cover
an easy single is taken as Rahane guides the length ball down to third man
slower delivery on off side, Kohli moves forward and defends it towards point
he goes on the back foot and punches it to long on for a single
drives it off the front foot, but is not able to beat the man at cover
tossed up delivery, the batsman pushes it down to long on for a single
tossed up delivery outside off, Rahane jumps out of the crease and slices it to deep cover, all along the ground
flatter delivery, the batsman waits for it before whipping it to deep midwicket
tossed up on the stumps, the batsman flicks it to short fine leg
he waits on the back foot and punches the length delivery to mid on
length delivery on off stump, slower delivery, the batsman defends it off the front foot
stays in the crease and punches the length ball to deep cover for a single
slightly back of length, but the batsman comes forward to punch it with timing. However, he is unable to beat the midwicket fielder

and Rahane breaks the monotony of singles with a ridiculously hit boundary! He just comes forward and chips the length delivery with the straightest of the bats, it bounces once before hitting the boundary boards
he comes forward now and defends the slower delivery to the leg side
allows the ball to turn in, then clips it straight to square leg
he comes out of the crease and tries to pinch a single past square leg, but a diving effort by the fielder prevents the run
that has been murdered through midwicket! It was only marginally short and stayed low as well, but Virat smashes it right in the gap
he comes out of the crease and tries to flick it to the leg side, but is beaten in the flight and plays a push in the air towards midwicket
flicks this one from the middle stump to short fine leg for a single
flatter delivery from the bowler, Rahane punches it back down the pitch
just like Gazi, Mominul serves a long hop first up! That has been smashed to the midwicket boundary with some disdain
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to off
he tries to smash the wide delivery too hard and is beaten by the low bounce on this instance
flighted on off stump, Kohli dabs it to point
he was looking to punch this flatter delivery to extra cover, but doesn't get the timing, picks up a single to cover
much better timing from Rahane, who stands tall and punches the flatter delivery to deep cover
this spins in and stays low, it's flicked to deep midwicket for a single
tossed up outside off, Kohli takes a forward step and punches it to long on
fuller delivery outside off, Rahane slashes at it and picks up a single to deep point
another wide from Gazi, he slips this down the leg side
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman defends it off the front foot
he beats the man at short third man with a late cut to get another boundary. Not sure if that was the intended direction, there was a bit of underedge there, but that takes India past 150
tossed up on off stump, he plays that whippy drive to long on for a single
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and drives to cover
another long hop! And Kohli keeps punishing them! He goes back and smashes it over the midwicket fielder.
slower and shorter outside off, Kohli misses out as he punches it to cover, stays a touch low
another one that comes slow off the pitch, Kohli dabs it to cover point
he stands tall and punches the length ball with a straight bat to deep cover
Mominul's length is allowing the batsmen to stay back and manoeuvre him with ease. Now he drops short on off and is comfortably punched to deep cover
he comes down the pitch to this low full toss and slaps it straight down the ground. Long on does well to get there, but ends up parrying the ball over the boundary
tosses it up, but this is down the leg side, it's not going to help Bangladesh
and another wide, these are freebies being given away
this is absolute filth! Hat-trick of down the leg wides
now he finds the right line. Tosses it up outside off and Kohli defends
excellent placement allows Kohli to pick up a couple past midwicket, that was hit softly enough so as to allow the batsman to come back for that second
shorter this time, that is slapped to deep midwicket for an easy single
now Rahane unfurls a classic! Tossed up delivery outside off and Rahane leans into it, gets it off the middle and there was no chance for the deep cover fielder to cut that off
the over goes on.. tossed up delivery on off, easily pushed to long on for a single
length ball on middle and leg, eased in front of square on the leg side
targets middle and leg again and this is an easy clip to deep midwicket
change in pace and Kohli can only block it into the off side. Mortaza rushes forward to field it himself
too straight again and Kohli works it off his pads to deep square leg
good length ball on the stumps, defended to mid-on
wristily worked in front of midwicket as this is shorter on off stump
tossed up on the pads, he calmly nudges it past midwicket for a single
flatter delivery on off, Kohli is moving towards yet another century without a fuss, picks up a single to long on
flatter and on off, flicked to the right of midwicket for a single
quicker and on off stump, Kohli pushes it to mid on off the back foot
fuller delivery on the pads, whipped to deep midwicket. Rubel is a touch slow there and the two batsmen are too quick.. they take a second
tossed up delivery on the middle and leg line, another single to long on
oh he places this one so smartly in the gap at deep midwicket! He whips it from the stumps and takes a couple
slower delivery outside off stump, the batsman pushes it to cover

he moves to 96 with a powerful drive down the ground, beats long-on with ease! It was a slower delivery and he spotted that early. He has been happy to take singles off them till now, but that was hit with some power
now he nudges it to midwicket for a quick single
fuller delivery, the batsman pushes it down the pitch, back to the bowler

oye that's very close! He induces a false shot from Rahane as he looks to play across the line to this slower ball! Loud appeal, looked like it was heading for middle and leg..The umpire doesn't think so. Hawkeye says it would have gone down leg. Nakedeye says it would have hit the leg stump
he moves to the back foot and tickles this one to square leg for a single
oh he steps out and eases it over extra cover with a ridiculously easy to the eye cover drive! Rahane's shots are in Rohit Sharma's class.. no effort.. just class
oh this is crisply crunched off the back foot, the fielder at long off runs to his right to keep them to a single
that's the whippy drive from Kohli, but he hits it straight to cover
short ball outside off, Kohli misses out probably, but he picks up a single to long off
fuller and quicker on the off stump, Rahane keeps the strike with a single to long off
he keeps bowling well, on the off stump and Rahane defends it towards midwicket
short of length delivery outside off, Rahane pushes it gently to long on for a single
he gets to his 19th ODI century with a dab to third man! How does he do these feats so easily! How doesn any bowling attack solve a problem like Kohli?
he pushes it to long on for a single
no sign of any lack of concentration as he dabs it through midwicket and hares back for a second
waits for the slower ball and then flicks it fine to short fine leg for a single
he comes forward and drives it to deep cover for a single
fuller and wider outside off, the batsman lets it go through
fuller and flighted, driven to deep extra cover for a single
steps out of the crease to reach the pitch of the ball, then pushes it to cover
too much air in this one, but Kohli misses out as he hits this low full toss straight to cover
short, very short, and that has been killed over midwicket! Whacked! The midwicket fielder leaped in the air, but he was never going to get it..
starts off with a short of length delivery on the stumps, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
he waits on the back foot and dabs it past point for a single

oh that's placed perfectly! The glance to the fine leg boundary gives Rahane his fourth half-century! He waited on the back foot for the short of length delivery, played it late and beat the man at fine leg with ease
now he comes forward to defend the length delivery back down the pitch

he has slapped that short of length delivery straight to midwicket! or is it! Mominul, the catcher, is not very sure. The umpires are going to check that. The catch was taken cleanly - that's what the replays show - but the doubtful part is after that. Was he able to keep his fingers underneath as he hit the ground? Slight wobble of his hands as he has the first grab at the ball - it's right on the edge of his fingers as he comes up .. Not out is the verdict.. So the umpire reckons the ball might have touched the ground
he pushes this length delivery to point
appeal for caught behind by the keeper, but no one else shows any interest
fuller and tossed up on the middle and leg line, Kohli whacks it along the ground, beautifully placed between midwicket and mid-on, no chance for any fielder..
now take that! He comes down the pitch and smashes it through extra cover..Hit with a lot of power
comes down the pitch again, and takes the ball on the full to drive it through wide mid-on.. Long-on has some work to do, to stop that from reaching the boundary
now he steps out and drives the full delivery firmly to long off
fuller and wider outside off, Rahane chooses the path of non-violence as he caresses this for a single to deep extra cover
he drives it with ease to deep cover again, Rubel serves up a full delivery outside off
he wants to finish this very quickly! He takes a step downs the pitch, gets under the delivery and smashes it over mid-off with a powerful mow
short of length delivery, it comes slower off the surface. Kohli pulls it fine for a couple
bowls a full delivery outside off, the batsman is not able to get his timing behind that as he pushes it to mid-off
similar delivery, this time he gets more timing, but is not able to beat the extra cover fielder
now he goes straighter, still not well timed, but that will give him the single for him to keep the strike
Nasir comes in to bowl and fires it down the leg side to start with
slower outside off, Kohli comes forward and defends
flatter and quicker on off, Kohli stays back and punches it to midwicket
walks down the pitch and flicks the offspinner over the midwicket fielder for a single to the deep
this is exquisite shot! Just walks down the pitch and chips it over extra cover and it lands just once before heading to the boundary..
flatter and quicker, the batsman punches it back down the pitch
presses forward and keeps the strike with a single to long on
stands tall and punches the length delivery to deep cover for a single
he steps forward like he is playing a spinner, punches Rubel on the up, but is not able to beat cover
tries to drive it through off, but gets an inside edge to midwicket
attempts a yorker, but it's a low full toss that is sliced to deep point

oh! this is so smooth! Just a punch through extra cover and how does that pick that much speed! No follow through of the bat, it at most looked like a defensive push.. It teases the fielder all the way to the boundary. Mushfiqur has done some damage now.. He landed awkwardly on the shoulder as he dived to haul it back
another length delivery is pushed to deep point with utmost ease
comes out of the crease and drives this firmly through extra cover, but there is protection in the deep for that exact shot
he leans forward and drives the tossed up delivery to long on to bring the 200 of the partnership
he gets to the pitch of the delivery and thwacks it with a lot of bottom hand, just a mere flick, but that crosses the boundary at deep midwicket
comes out of the crease, but is not to the pitch of the ball, defends
only marginally short, he goes deep into the crease and punches it to wide long on
fuller and flighted, Rahane seems to playing his own quiet game, pushes it to long on for a single
no one's trying any more, it seems! This is a full delivery and Rahane just flicks it to deep midwicket.. But there is no one chasing the ball...
full delivery on off, Rahane calmly pushes it to cover
short of length on off, but Rahane is already on the front foot and leaning forward, he crisply times it to deep cover

Would you believe it! Bangla_fan's wish has come true. Rubel produces a wonderful yorker, aimed at the base of off, from nowhere and Kohli is a touch slow to bring his bat down. The off stump takes a beating..What an innings again! He didn't look like he was getting out tonight.. But this has come too late for Bangladesh
bowls a good first ball to the batsman, aimed at the off stump. Rayudu flicks it  to deep square leg off the front foot
stays in the crease and defends the length delivery to point
tossed up delivery on off, Rayudu comes forward and defends
some spin for Nasir, but Rayudu goes deep in the crease and punches it to long on
flatter and straighter, Rahane stands tall and punches it to long on
floated on the leg stump line, the batsman defends it to midwicket
he stays in the crease and pushes the length delivery back to the bowler
he whips it to backward square leg with the turn to pick up an easy single
tossed up delivery on the stumps, he flicks it straight to midwicket
flatter and shorter, easily punched to long on for a single
another anti-climactic dismissal! Rahane plays his typical chip down the wicket, gets it off the toe end and he gets it only as far as long-on.. Suddenly there is music playing in the stands..
he has bowled quite a few of these, he bowls one now again, pushed through down the leg side
stays in the crease and punches it to long on for a single
tossed up delivery on off, DK picks up a single to long on
he steps out of the crease and picks up one more at long on
the fielder gives it a good chase and prevents it from reaching the boundary. Looked like they were the winning runs as the batsman drove the low full toss through the gap at cover
comes forward and defends it to midwicket
waits on the back foot and punches the back of length delivery to cover
steps out of the crease and hits it straight to mid-off. Still no run
fuller and flighted, Rayudu drives this to deep midwicket to bring the scores level
and India complete the win with a single to cover
